Text: I just finished downloading and took a quick look on the lessons and I would say that this material is beginner only. It's very, very basic. Probably a great start for someone who like to learn how to play guitar.

Downloaded. This program is great. Learned more in 3 days than I have in the year I've been playing. I've tryed out a lot of different teaching books and programs and this is by for the best one in my opinion. Give it a try. You might like it.
